Description

delete(singleOrbitRef: google.cloud.firestore_v1beta1.document.DocumentReference)[source]¶

Description This function deletes an orbit from the database Note that this function should not be called directly from any logics,

since you have to delete all references to it from RideRequest, Event, etc.

static get_with_transaction(transaction: google.cloud.firestore_v1beta1.transaction.Transaction, orbitRef: google.cloud.firestore_v1beta1.document.DocumentReference) → gravitate.domain.orbit.models.Orbit[source]¶

Description Note that this cannot take place if transaction already received write operations. “If a transaction is used and it already has write operations added, this method cannot be used (i.e. read-after-write is not allowed).”
